question: Rahat Indori, who recently passed away, was associated with which profession?
explanation:
Veteran Bollywood lyricist and Urdu poet Dr. Rahat Indori has recently passed away at the age of 70 after being tested positive for Covid-19.
The poet has recently completed 50 years in the field of poetry. He has written several famous Bollywood songs for many hit movies. He has also penned several Urdu poems and mushairas and his latest poem has been titled 'Bulati Hai Magar Jaane Ka Nahi.â€™
